name: ChrisPirillo/space-rose
description: Explore Space Rose, a mesmerizing interactive generative art experience powered by WebGL. Create and customize unique, swirling cosmic nebulas and export them as stunning 4K wallpapers.

name: ChrisPirillo/lumicube
description: Explore Lumicube, an interactive 3D fractal art generator. Manipulate mesmerizing WebGL visuals in real-time and create your own unique digital sculptures.

name: ChrisPirillo/weboprompter
description: Weboprompter is a free, browser-based teleprompter for creators. Easily load, edit, and scroll scripts with customizable speed, font size, and mirroring. No installation required.

name: ChrisPirillo/endless-hacker
description: Immerse yourself in the Endless Hacker, a retro terminal simulation. Experience the thrill of simulated hacking with dynamic commands, code generation, and branching mission objectives. Press any key to begin your infiltration.

name: ChrisPirillo/quantum-platelets
description: Explore Quantum Platelets, a mesmerizing interactive art experience powered by WebGL. Manipulate abstract, glowing particle fields in real-time to create unique visual phenomena.

name: ChrisPirillo/morphosphere
description: A captivating, interactive WebGL shader experience. Manipulate a morphing sphere of light and color in real-time.

name: ChrisPirillo/whitecap-whirlpool
description: Immerse yourself in Whitecap Whirlpool, an interactive WebGL visualizer. Control the flow, zoom, brightness, hue, and detail to create your own mesmerizing digital abstract art. A creative coding experiment.

name: ChrisPirillo/fireflies
description: An interactive, generative art experience featuring mesmerizing, simulated fireflies. Control their color, speed, brightness, and more in this relaxing WebGL visualizer.

name: ChrisPirillo/cyber-traffic
description: Immerse yourself in Cyber Traffic, a mesmerizing interactive WebGL art experience. Control the flow of a digital kaleidoscope of light and color through a real-time shader simulation.

name: ChrisPirillo/spelunker
description: Dive into Spelunker, a thrilling retro-style arcade game. Explore procedurally generated caves, collect keys, avoid deadly traps, and find the exit. Can you survive the depths?

name: ChrisPirillo/fractal-clouds
description: An interactive, real-time fractal cloud visualizer running in the browser using WebGL. Adjust parameters like speed, color, and geometry to create unique animated fractal patterns.

name: ChrisPirillo/pipe-dream
description: Experience Pipe Dream, a mesmerizing 3D screensaver-like simulation of endless, colorful pipes being built in real-time. Customize the speed, complexity, and visuals in this interactive WebGL art piece.

name: ChrisPirillo/kaleidoscope
description: An interactive webcam kaleidoscope that transforms your camera feed into a mesmerizing, real-time visual art piece with customizable patterns and motion.

name: ChrisPirillo/qix
description: Play Qix, a classic arcade game of skill and strategy. Claim territory by drawing lines while avoiding the deadly Qix and Sparx. A retro gaming experience.

name: ChrisPirillo/shatter-lab
description: Explore Shatter Lab, an interactive 3D physics sandbox. Load your own STL models, customize explosion parameters like force, fragments, and gravity, and watch them shatter in real-time.

name: ChrisPirillo/ribbon-waves
description: Ribbon Waves is an interactive generative art experience. Create and customize mesmerizing, abstract ribbon-like visuals in real-time. Export your unique creation as a 4K wallpaper.

name: ChrisPirillo/spectro-bloom
description: Create and explore mesmerizing, ever-evolving floral nebulas with Spectro Bloom. An interactive WebGL experience  that lets you control the cosmos.

name: ChrisPirillo/typing-exe
description: Challenge your typing skills with TYPING.EXE, a retro-themed typing speed game. See how many words you can correctly type in 60 seconds and compete for the high score.

name: ChrisPirillo/crop-circles
description: An interactive 3D crop circle generator. Create, view, and export complex and beautiful crop circle patterns in a realistic field environment.

name: ChrisPirillo/aqua-force
description: Experience Aqua Force, an interactive fluid dynamics simulation. Control water jets to move and spin rings in a beautiful, physics-based underwater world.

name: ChrisPirillo/zen-garden
description: Create your own Japanese karesansui (dry landscape garden) with this interactive 3D Zen Garden. Rake sand, place rocks, and find your moment of calm.

name: ChrisPirillo/kinetic-craze
description: Experience Kinetic Craze, an interactive web application that transforms your text into mesmerizing kinetic typography animations. Choose from over 30 effects like vortex, matrix, and 3D sphere.

name: ChrisPirillo/keystroke-capers
description: Keystroke Capers is an interactive web-based toy that generates unique, artistic visuals and percussive sounds for every key you press. Explore a world of fonts, colors, and animations.

name: ChrisPirillo/jezzball
description: Play a pixel-perfect recreation of the classic 90s Windows game, JezzBall. Build walls to capture the area while avoiding the bouncing balls. A true retro arcade experience!

name: ChrisPirillo/flux-weaver
description: Experience Flux Weaver, an interactive WebGL art generator. Create and manipulate mesmerizing, fluid-like visual patterns in real-time. Adjust waves, colors, and speed to craft your own unique digital art.

name: ChrisPirillo/cyberpunk-text
description: Create custom, animated cyberpunk-style text with glitch, scan line, and RGB shift effects. Instantly generate and download your futuristic, dystopian text as a PNG.

name: ChrisPirillo/synesthesia
description: An interactive, browser-based audio-visual experience. Create generative art and music by clicking, typing, or using your microphone. Explore different soundscapes and visual effects.

name: ChrisPirillo/ascii-painter
description: A free, web-based ASCII Art Painter. Draw with characters, customize brushes, use gradients, and export your creations as text (.txt) or image (.png) files. Perfect for artists, developers, and hobbyists.

name: ChrisPirillo/nice-dice
description: A free, interactive 3D dice roller. Customize the number of dice, their colors, and the felt surface. Roll dice for your favorite tabletop games with realistic physics and sound.

name: ChrisPirillo/particle-man
description: An interactive generative art piece called 'Particle Man' by Chris Pirillo. Control thousands of particles with a dynamic flow field, and interact with them using your mouse.

name: ChrisPirillo/quantum-reversi
description: Engage in a futuristic battle of wits with Quantum Reversi, a sci-fi themed strategy board game built with Three.js. Challenge the CPU or a friend in this modern take on a classic.

name: ChrisPirillo/binary-suns
description: Explore a vast, procedurally generated desert world under the light of two suns in this immersive 3D planet simulator. Fly across the landscape and collect mysterious orbs in a serene, endless environment.

name: ChrisPirillo/8bit-battle
description: Engage in classic 8-bit tank warfare! Play against the CPU in this retro-inspired, single-player combat game with dynamic, indestructible terrain.

name: ChrisPirillo/gravity-grid
description: Play Gravity Grid, a modern 3D version of the classic four-in-a-row game. Challenge the CPU or a friend in this visually rich strategy game with satisfying physics and sound.

name: ChrisPirillo/theremin
description: Experience an interactive, browser-based Theremin. Create haunting melodies and cosmic soundscapes with your mouse or touch. Features advanced controls for sound synthesis, effects, and a reactive visualizer.

name: ChrisPirillo/amulet-yandor
description: Embark on a perilous journey in 'The Amulet of Yandor', a classic roguelike adventure. Descend into the dungeon, find the legendary amulet, and return to the surface to save your village.

name: ChrisPirillo/pixel-dust
description: Create beautiful, interactive art from your images. Upload a photo and watch it deconstruct into a cloud of dynamic particles you can control and manipulate.

name: ChrisPirillo/terminal-vision
description: An interactive, real-time ASCII art converter that uses your webcam. Adjust resolution, brightness, color, and character sets to create unique terminal-style visuals.

name: ChrisPirillo/trench-wars
description: Engage in Trench Wars, a retro vector-style arcade game. Pilot your ship through treacherous trenches, destroy enemy TIE fighters, and defend your shields in this classic space shooter experience.

name: ChrisPirillo/sprite-sidescroller
description: Create, play, and share your own 8-bit side-scrolling platformer levels with this in-browser game generator and level editor. Build worlds with custom sprites and challenge your friends!

name: ChrisPirillo/sandtris
description: Play Sand Tetris (Sandtris), a unique block puzzle game where pieces crumble like sand. Optimize your strategy to clear masses and achieve high scores. Developed by Chris Pirillo.

name: ChrisPirillo/png-defaker
description: Fix pixel art and other images by removing fake transparent backgrounds (checkerboards, solid colors) easily. Adjust tolerance and shrink edges for perfect results.

name: ChrisPirillo/picturino
description: A powerful, browser-based image editor. Apply filters, adjust brightness, contrast, saturation, and more with this easy-to-use online tool.

name: ChrisPirillo/pattern-wallpaper
description: Explore and create unique generative art patterns for wallpapers and backgrounds with the Generative Pattern Wallpaper Studio. Customize complexity, style, and colors.

name: ChrisPirillo/life-dashboard
description: Discover fascinating statistics about your life based on your birth date. Explore metrics on physiology, daily habits, societal impact, technology usage, environmental footprint, and cosmic journey. Your Life Dashboard provides a unique perspective on your existence.

name: ChrisPirillo/droid-repair
description: Master math skills and repair droids in this engaging Jedi-themed educational game. Solve geometry, algebra, measurement, fractions, and data analysis problems.

name: ChrisPirillo/cybersweeper
description: Play Cybersweeper, a futuristic take on the classic minesweeper game. Challenge yourself with different game modes, unlock power-ups, and compete for the top score.

name: ChrisPirillo/css-art
description: Instantly convert any image into pure CSS pixel art. Upload a picture, adjust resolution and size, and generate clean, copy-pasteable CSS box-shadow code.

name: ChrisPirillo/circuit-breaker
description: Generate hyperrealistic PCB circuit board designs with customizable density, complexity, and colors. Explore intricate virtual electronics.

name: ChrisPirillo/ascii-attack
description: Play ASCII Attack, a retro style arcade shooter in your browser. Battle swarms of ASCII enemies, dodge their fire, and clear levels. Features full mobile touch controls.
